metadata.title: CVE-2021-44733 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A use-after-free exists in drivers/tee/tee_shm.c in the TEE subsystem inthe Linux kernel through 5.15.11. This occurs because of a race conditionin tee_shm_get_from_id during an attempt to free a shared memory object.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
